mention.text: a pardon law that authorizes colombian president virgilio barco to `` pardon '' over the next 6 months the armed groups that have demonstrated their desire for peace

the government in the agreement signed with the m-19 as a result of the negotiations that began last march and that should conclude with the total demobilization of the m-19 and the delivery of its weapons to the socialist international
the m-19 as a result of the negotiations
the total demobilization of the m-19
measure , which is part of the `` package '' of constitutional reforms proposed by the government
constitutional reforms proposed by the government
a referendum to consult the colombian people on the extradition issue
the colombian chamber of representatives ' approval of the inclusion of the extradition issue in the referendum
cesar turbay ayala and misael pastrana borrero
leaders of the liberal and conservative parties
